text_block_list.text:
It is the first day of a summer camp where students stay at a 
seaside facility to improve their skills.
During free time, I went to check on Mayano Top Gun and―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh, it's finally over!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Geez, Why do I have to do homework for general 
classes during summer training～……
choice_data_list: Did you do your homework by yourself!?
Did you do your homeowork by yourself?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, trainer-chan!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, that's right! 
It was so～～～～～ boring, but I did it♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehehehe, I know right～～!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I still haven't found that "purpose" 
you talked about before, but―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I'm going to keep on trying to find it.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh, yeah! Hey-hey, trainer-chan! As a reward for doing homework! 
Let's go to the beach! You're fine with that, right?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hooray! Then let's hurry―

text_block_list.name: Serious Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Mayano-san, I heard from the teacher! 
You're amazing!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huh? What do you mean??

text_block_list.name: Serious Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Last quiz! You were using formulas we didn't learn in class 
to get your answers, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Serious Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
She said, "I've always been curious about how she was able to 
finish her tests so fast." The teacher praised you, saying, 
"That's a very efficient formula!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh, really? 
I thought everyone solved it the same way……

text_block_list.name: Serious Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Mayano-san, you're always falling asleep in class. The teacher said, 
she wanted to you to teach the class about the formula.

text_block_list.name: Serious Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Hey, I don't mean to be brazen, but…… If you don't mind, could you 
help me with my studies sometime?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh…… Uh, yeah! Sure! Of course!

text_block_list.name: Serious Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Yay! Thank you!!! I've had a hard time talking to you until 
now because I thought we were so different……

text_block_list.name: Serious Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad I called out to you! 
I'm looking forward to it!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
…Uhmm 
Trainer-chan… should we go.
Mayano Top Gun took me by the hand and headed outside.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ……………Woah.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Wow…… wow……! Hey-hey-hey-hey, trainer! 
Did you hear what she just said!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
This is Maya's first time ever being praised for 
studying like that! And I made a new friend!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I see, so the teacher asked me to "write down 
the equation" because she was curious to see 
how Maya would come up with the answer.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……You know, up until now, Maya sometimes wondered, 
"Why don't you understand?" To everyone who says "I don't know".

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But I'm sure it's because everyone has 
a different "way" of doing things!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Like formulas, the way you run is different, 
and there are different ways to do it, so you get worried!
choice_data_list: If you continue learning, it will broaden your horizons.
If you continue learning, it will broaden your horizons.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I know, right? Maya feels like the clouds just poofed up in front 
of her and the blue sky went boom!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……I see. Maybe "doing homework" means something different to Maya 
than it does to everyone else!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm……… to let the teachers get to know Maya! I must 
communitcate in a way that says, "This is how Maya does it!"

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
and then, after the teacher got to know Maya 
she'll tell everyone about her……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: We could get to know each other better than we do now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey-hey! This can be done not only with 
teachers and friends, but also with Trainer-chan, right?
choice_data_list: You want me to give you homework?
You want me to give you homework?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! If it's Trainer-chan's… 
Is it going to be homework for running?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Homework that is made just for Maya……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Even if you are not around, 
Maya will still feel connected with you right?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
When I think about it like that, even the most tedious homework 
will feel a bit less tedious!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Eh, really!? 
Maya sounded like a grown-up!?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe… Ehehehehe～! I see～ Maya is getting 
closer to becoming an adult woman～!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Well then～…… Trainer-chan!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Uhmm. 
―Give me an adult reward♪
At the request of Mayano Top Gun, we came to the beach at night.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Woah～～～! The stars are beautiful! 
The ocean is beautiful!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
And the sound of the waves, quietly 
rippling…… mmmm～, I feel like an adult!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
If I remember correctly, there should be a rock over there 
that looks like it would be easy to sit on. 
Let's get over there, trainer-chan!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Let's sit down and have a nice, quiet chat! It's 
just like being an adult, isn't it!
We headed towards the rock―

text_block_list.name: Couple (The man)
text_block_list.text: Now, close your eyes……

text_block_list.name: Couple (The woman)
text_block_list.text: Yeah……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hyawa……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Awawa, Awawawawa～～～～～!
…The next day, Mayano Top Gun had a fever.
